title: Earthly Delight Pomade | Natural and pH Balanced Pomade - 4oz
features: 4 OUNCE EARTHLY DELIGHT POMADE - The pomade stimulates circulation in the scalp, oxygenates the hair follicle and fortifies the shaft contributing to thicker, stronger, healthier looking hair.
MADE WITH NATURAL INGREDIENTS - Our Pomade is made with natural ingredients, which include Argan Oil and Essential Oils. It is also pH balanced!
SAFE FOR ALL TYPES OF HAIR - Lafe's Earthly Delight Pomade is a natural scalp and hair nourishing system created for all hair types, even color treated hair!
VEGAN & CRUELTY FREE – Lafe’s products are vegan, plant based products that are made with natural and organic botanicals. We NEVER test on animals!

B CORP CERTIFIED, FAMILY OWNED AND MADE IN THE USA! – Lafe’s has been a family owned company since its inception. Being a B Corp Certified company, we meet the highest verified standards of social and environmental performance, transparency, and accountability. Plus, we are MADE IN THE USA!
description: Earthly Delight Pomade helps to create a healthy environment for the hair to help address problems with fine, thinning hair. The pomade stimulates circulation in the scalp, oxygenates the hair follicle and fortifies the shaft contributing to thicker, stronger, healthier looking hair. Pleasant, mild herbal scent. One percent of company profits go to support breast cancer awareness and prevention. Lafes’ strives to create organic products that are free of toxins and harmful chemicals, because what goes on your body, goes in your body.
